cards.flavor_text: [i]“My first death was the strongest, to enter the Cycle and taste Lady Meng's tea. But then I remembered my duty.”[/i]
[i]The claws of even a newborn cub can match the heat of an Upper Core Formation-tier technique.[/i]
[i]The blades of the yaoguai flutter like ribbons of cloth in the breeze, easily dancing past a parrying blade only to slice through armor and bone alike.[/i]
[i]To wander the jianghu is to be the opportune blade, meeting foes at the intersection of foresight and coincidence.[/i]

• Deal 4 damage to target player.
• Target creature can't block this turn.

[i]Taming a zheng requires patience, persistence, and honor. Hozen find hanging on tightly to work nearly as well.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Convoke
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose and exile X nonland cards from among them. You may cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

First strike
Whenever an opponent loses 1 or more life during your turn, exile that many cards from the top of their library. You may cast the exiled cards this turn by sacrificing a number of creatures equal to the exiled card's mana cost.
{1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this only as a sorcery
cards.flavor_text: [i]Qi flowed through its veins in place of blood. Talismans hid its face from light.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Whenever this creature blocks, up to one target creature you control gets +3/+3 and up to one target creature you don't control gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.rules_text2:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
Creatures you control have skulk.
Sacrifice a creature: Return this land to your hand.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, exile cards from target opponent's library equal to its power. For as long as those cards remain exiled, you may cast those cards and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.
When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.

{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

cards.rules_text:

Whenever this creature enters or mutates, mill three cards. Then exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard and create a token that's copy of it except it's 1/1.
